name: The Dodging Bear: Dodge the falling beehives
name_original: The Dodging Bear: Dodge the falling beehives
description:
Help the bear dodge the beehives! Dodge the objects falling and help the bear collect as much honey as possible! He really likes it!

Special Features
Cute Graphics! - show your honey-collecting skills
Help the Bear - he will be hungry without you!
Achievements - unlock new levels!
Gameplay Statistics - climb the leader board and be the best

The bear is hungry and needs your help to avoid the beehives!

Hello young bear lovers! Here's the sweetest honey pot for you! This update includes:
• Multiplayer! 
• Custom Leaderboards
• Challenge Friends
• Achievements
• Gameplay Statistics
• Share Scores to Facebook and Twitter
• Encouraging Messages
• Clever Notifications
Thanks for you support and keep on giving us those amazing five stars rates!
